PARAGRAPH.STRING: (Arabic: قطر [IPA: ˈqɑ̱.tˁɑ̱r]), officially the State of Qatar (Arabic: دولة قطر , Dawlat Qatar), is an emirate in the Middle East and Western Asia, occupying the small Qatar Peninsula on the northeasterly coast of the larger Arabian Peninsula.
is bordered by Saudi Arabia to the south; otherwise the Persian Gulf surrounds
